data.text: Oseiko ringe kendo oloso divai mare moru mamit,
Oseoro jotichne ma nyiri, kendo oluongo ji
“Weuru ji duto mangʼeyogi tin obi kae!”
Weuru yoreu maonge rieko, eka unubed mangima,
Ngʼat marieyo ja-ajara luongo mana wichkuot,
Kik ikwer ngʼat ma jaro ji, nikech mano biro miyo obedo mamon kodi,
Puonj ngʼat mariek, to obiro bedo mariek moloyo,
Luoro Jehova Nyasaye e chakruok mar rieko,
Nimar kuoma ndalogi biro bedo mangʼeny,
Owacho ni jogo maonge gi rieko mar ngʼado bura niya,
To ok gingʼeyo kata matin ni joma otho ni kuno;
